item.title: Cascaded Shadow Mapping
item.description: This is how you do Cascaded Shadow Mapping, just copy the following code and paste it into your project! #include <iostream> int main() { std::cout << "Hello World!" << std::endl; std::cin.get(); } Just Kidding, I am currently working on this file XD
item.content:
This is how you do Cascaded Shadow Mapping, just copy the following code and paste it into your project!

#include <iostream>

int main()
{
  std::cout << "Hello World!" << std::endl;
  std::cin.get();
}

Just Kidding, I am currently working on this file XD
